note.p: Research Field: Applied mathematics, theoretical and general physics
Career: Lecturer and Fellow, Christ's College, Cambridge
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1963 vol 9 pp 69-85, plate, by G P Thomson
References: P B Moon, 'The (London) Physics Club, 1928-1953' in NR 1992 vol 46 pp 171-174
R Singh and F Riess, 'The nobel laureate Sir Chandrasekhara Venkata Raman FRS and his contacts with the British Scientific community in a social and political context' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 47-64
J S Rowlinson, 'The war time work of Hinshelwood and his colleagues' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 161-175
